This Special Skill defines a higher knowledge of the tactical environment allowing its user a greater operational capability, providing him with an extra Tactical Order.

{{css_skillbox |black| TACTICAL AWARENESS | AUTOMATIC SKILL }}
{{skill-label | Optional }}
{{effects}}
* This Special Skill grants its user a [[Tactical Order]] in addition to the one provided by their [[Training]] Characteristic (Regular or Irregular).
* During the [[Order Count]] step, if the user is on the game table as a Model or Marker, the player places a Tactical Order beside the user.
* If the Trooper is placed on the game table during the [[Orders Phase]], a Tactical Order must be placed next to the Trooper who has this Special Skill.
* If the Trooper with this Special Skill is a member of a [[Fireteam]] and is designated as the Team Leader, this Order can be used to activate the Fireteam.
{{css_skillbox-end}}
